snippet: Mr. Trump’s political debut with black religious leaders was refashioned into a private meeting with a smaller group that downplayed talk of endorsements.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump's scheduled meeting with 100 black ministers and religious leaders is scaled back into private get-together with small group that plays down talk of endorsements; many who had been billed as attendees deny accepting invitations, citing number of racially insensitive remarks in Trump's past.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and JOHN CORRALES
byline.contributor: Alex Burns and Steve Eder contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s political debut with black religious leaders was refashioned into a private meeting with a smaller group that downplayed talk of endorsements.

headline.main: ‘Love’ and Disbelief Follow Donald Trump Meeting With Black Leaders
headline.print_headline: ‘Love’ and Disbelief Follow Trump Meeting With Black Leaders
